me.timothy.bots.database

Interface PromotionBlacklistMapping

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ObjectMapping<PromotionBlacklist>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MysqlPromotionBlacklistMapping

    public interface PromotionBlacklistMapping
extends ObjectMapping<PromotionBlacklist>
    Maps PromotionBlacklist users

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean contains(int userId)
      Determines if the given person id is on the promotion blacklist, ignoring entries where deleted at is not null
      java.util.List<PromotionBlacklist> fetchAllById(int userId)
      Fetches all entries, including deleted entries, for the given user id
      PromotionBlacklist fetchByUserId(int userId)
      Fetches the person on the promotion blacklist with the given user id, ignoring rows where deleted at is not null.
      void remove(int userId)
      Removes the entry corresponding with the given user id.

      • Methods inherited from interface me.timothy.bots.database.ObjectMapping

        fetchAll, save

    • Method Detail

      • contains

        boolean contains(int userId)
        Determines if the given person id is on the promotion blacklist, ignoring entries where deleted at is not null
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of the user
        Returns:
        if they are on the blacklist

      • fetchByUserId

        PromotionBlacklist fetchByUserId(int userId)
        Fetches the person on the promotion blacklist with the given user id, ignoring rows where deleted at is not null.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user id of the person
        Returns:
        the corresponding row in the database, null if none

      • fetchAllById

        java.util.List<PromotionBlacklist> fetchAllById(int userId)
        Fetches all entries, including deleted entries, for the given user id
        Parameters:
        userId - the user id
        Returns:
        all related entries

      • remove

        void remove(int userId)
        Removes the entry corresponding with the given user id. Note that this is just a shorthand for setting the removed at timestamp to now.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user id to remove
